member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData
member.summary: The BatchReadData class contains code to represent an object populated during a batch data read operation through the DAS Data Reader

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData.BatchName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the batch to be read from Colleague.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Colleague file against which the batch read operation will be performed.
member.value: The name of the Colleague file.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData.Keys
member.summary: Gets or sets the keys which are to be read from Colleague in the batch read operation.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData.Records
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of Colleague record objects that were read during the batch read operation.
member.value: The collection of Colleague record objects.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData.InvalidKeys
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of invalid keys that were encountered during the Colleague batch read operation.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData.BatchReadStatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the batch read status code for the Colleague batch read operation.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData.BatchReadStatusCode2
member.summary: Gets or sets the secondary batch read status code for the Colleague batch read operation.
member.value: The secondary batch read status code.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.BatchReadData.BatchReadStatusMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the batch read status message, if applicable, for the Colleague batch read operation.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession
member.summary: The DasSession class contains code to interact via DMI with the DAS listener of a Colleague environment

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.DatabaseType
member.summary: Gets the database type to which this DAS session is connected.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.InstalledApplications
member.summary: Gets the list of applications installed in the Colleague environment to which this DAS session is connected.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.DateConversionString
member.summary: Gets the UniData date conversion string configured to be used in the Colleague environment to which this DAS session is connected.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.IntlParamsRecord
member.summary: Gets the international parameters record that is configured in the Colleague environment to which this DAS session is connected.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.Timeout
member.summary: Gets the configured DAS session timeout value for the Colleague environment to which this DAS session is connected.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.DasUnsuccessfulLoginCounter
member.summary: Gets the unsuccessful login counter for logins attempted through this DAS session instance.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.EnvironmentName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Colleague environment to which this DAS session is connected.
member.value: The name of the Colleague environment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the IP address or host name for DAS listener to which this DAS session is connected.
member.value: The IP address or host name.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port number for the DAS listener to which this DAS session is connected.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.ProcessLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the current Colleague process level for the current DAS session.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession.Token
member.summary: Gets the security token for the currently connected DAS session.

member.summary: Lowers the process level of the DAS listener as an asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Performs a batch read operation of Colleague records as an asynchronous operation.

The list of keys we are attempting to read from Colleague in the batch read operation.

member.summary: Begin a batch read operation from Colleague as an asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Load a list of keys into the DAS for the purposes of limiting query results from a subsequent select statement as an asynchronous operation

member.summary: Gets the set of keys from a previously executed select statement as an asynchronous operation

member.summary: Send a DMI request to the DAS as an asynchronous operation. In case the DAS session token has expired/no longer exists, get a new token, and resend the request.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool
member.summary: Handles the pool of DasSession connections

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.dasSettings
member.summary: Gets the DAS settings associated with the given pooled connection.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes the class.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.SetDasSettings(Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.DasSettings)
member.summary: Sets the colleague settings. Use in cases where the settings are not stored in web/app.config.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.SetSizeAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the maximum pool size of the named pool with the specified size.
member.param: The size of the connection pool.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.ShrinkPoolAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all idle connections from the named pool, disconnecting each of them. This allows the pool to shrink without impacting active connections.
member.param: The name of the connection pool to shrink.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.CloseAllConnectionsAsync
member.summary: Closes all open DMI server connections.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.CreatePoolCollectionsAsync(slf4net.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Creates the concurrent collection objects for the named connection pool.
member.param: The name of the new connection pool to create.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.ConnectionPoolName(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a string identifier consisting of the unique components of a DMI connection that can be used to identify the connection pool for a distinct DMI listener.
member.param: Boolean indicating the use of a secure connection.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.CreateConnectionAsync(slf4net.ILogger)
member.summary: Creates a DMI server connection object to the DMI listener as an asynchronous operation using settings from the configuration file.
member.returns: Returns a connected DasSession instance.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.GetAsync(slf4net.ILogger)
member.summary: Waits for an available slot in the active connection pool and when the active connections are below the pool size, it will then try to get a connection from the idle connection pool. If there are no available idle connections, this will return a null which indicates that a new server connection may be created.
member.returns: A DasSession instance from the pool.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.ReturnConnectionToPoolAsync(slf4net.ILogger,Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession)
member.summary: Moves a pooled connection object to an idle connection pool.
member.param: The DAS session to return to the pool.
member.returns: Returns a boolean indicating whether the DasSession instance was successfully returned to the pool.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.PutAsync(slf4net.ILogger,Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSession,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a connection object to an idle connection pool.
member.param: The name of the connection pool to which to add the connection
member.returns: Returns a boolean indicating whether the DasSession instance was successfully added to the connection pool

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasSessionPool.ReleaseConnectionPoolLock(slf4net.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Release one thread from the pool lock.
member.param: The name of the connection pool to release the thread from

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasUtils
member.summary: Contains helper methods for extracting and parsing data from DMI response strings/subsets

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasUtils.Field(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts a component of a string based upon the provided delimiter and field position parameters.
member.param: The input string from which to extract.
The delimiter to search for in the string.
The field/section of the string to return.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasUtils.Fields(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts multiple components of a string based upon the provided delimiter and field position parameters.
member.param: The input string from which to extract.
The delimiter to search for in the string.
The field/section of the string at which to start the extraction, returning that field and all remaining data.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasUtils.Fields(System.String,System.Char,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts multiple components of a string based upon the provided delimiter and field position parameters.
member.param: The input string from which to extract.
The delimiter to search for in the string.
The field/section of the string at which to start the extraction, returning that field and all data up to, and including the last field (per the specified parameter)
The last field/section of the string to return.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasUtils.FieldCount(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: Returns the total number of fields in a given string per the specified delimiter parameter.
member.param: The delimiter to use when counting fields.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasUtils.TryParseErrorSubset(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@)
member.summary: Tries to parse an error subset from the specified string, assumed to be a DMI transaction response.
member.param: The input string to parse, assumed to be a DMI transaction response.
The list of error messages to return as output, if found, within the input string.
member.returns: Boolean value indicating whether this was string, assumed to be a DMI transaction response, that contained an error subset.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasUtils.ReplaceDmiTxHeader(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the existing DMI transaction header portion of a transaction string with a new DMI transaction header.
member.param: The new DMI transaction header to replace in the provided DMI transaction string.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.DasUtils.GetEndOfHeaderIndex(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the index marking the end of the DMI transaction header within the specified DMI transaction string.
member.param: The DMI transaction string in which to search for the end of the DMI transaction header.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus
member.summary: Enumeration for primary read status results during Colleague I/O operations. Results correspond to MIO.STAT.values in UT.INSERTS > I_COMMON

member.summary: Normal status; corresponds to MIO.STAT.NORMAL

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus.Fail
member.summary: Failure status; corresponds to MIO.STAT.FAIL

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus.Locked
member.summary: Locked record status; correspond to MIO.STAT.LOCKED

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2
member.summary: Enumeration for primary read status results during Colleague I/O operations. Results correspond to MIO.STAT2.values in UT.INSERTS > I_COMMON

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.Normal
member.summary: Normal status; corresponds to MIO.STAT.NORMAL

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.RecordNotFound
member.summary: Record not found status; corresponds to MIO.STAT2.REC.NOT.FOUND

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.UnopenedFile
member.summary: Unopened file status; corresponds to MIO.STAT2.UNOPENED.FILE

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.NullKey
member.summary: Null key status; corresponds to MIO.STAT2.NULL.KEY

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.InvalidKeyVar
member.summary: Invalid key variable status; corresponds to MIO.STAT2.INVALID.KEY.VAR

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.WriteFail
member.summary: Write fail status; corresponds to MIO.STAT2.WRITE.FAIL

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.IoFailure
member.summary: IO failure status; corresponds to MIO.STAT2.IO.FAILURE

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.BadProcessLevel
member.summary: Bad process level status; corresponds to MIO.STAT2.BAD.PROCESS.LEVEL

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.DataChanged
member.summary: Data changed status; corresponds to MIO.STAT2.DATA.CHANGED

member.name: F:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.ReadStatus2.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown status; to be used in error cases that fall outside of those above

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.SelectResult
member.summary: Object to hold Colleague metadata related to the results from a database-issued query statement

member.summary: Gets or sets the query value passed in by the developer to issue against the Colleague database.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.Das.SelectResult.DasQuery
member.summary: Gets or sets the DAS query value. This query is the validated/translated and actually sent to the DAS listener for the query against the Colleague database

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file the query is being issued against.

member.summary: This response is included as part of an LGRS response when the request was received with an SGMFAQ subset. It includes a service token that will be included with the subsequent SVMFAQ for verification.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.GetMultifactorAuthenticationResponse.ServiceToken
member.summary: The temporary service token needed to include with a future MFA OTP verify request

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.VerifyMultifactorAuthenticationRequest

member.summary: The one-time password the user received on their device

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.VerifyMultifactorAuthenticationRequest.ServiceToken
member.summary: The temporary service token received from SGMFAS

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.VerifyMultifactorAuthenticationResponse
member.summary: This response is included as part of an LGRS response when the request was received with an SVMFAQ subset.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.VerifyMultifactorAuthenticationResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: The temporary service token needed to include with a future MFA OTP verify request

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory
member.summary: This class provides a factory interface for mass-producing DMI-related objects, such as an Application Server connection and a transaction object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.#ctor
member.summary: Default/base Constructor. DMI connection parameters are retrieved from the application's configuration file and stored in this factory instance.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.#ctor(slf4net.ILogger)
member.summary: Constructor that takes in an ILogger object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.#ctor(Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.DmiSettings)
member.summary: Constructor that obtains DMI connection parameters from the DmiSettings object, as opposed to using the application configuration file.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.#ctor(slf4net.ILogger,Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.DmiSettings)
member.summary: Constructor that obtains DMI connection parameters from the DmiSettings object, as opposed to using the application configuration file. It also takes in an ILogger object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.CreateDasConnectionAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method creates an DAS connection and opens a socket based on the autoConnect argument. Based on the security settings in the web.config, the client may be SSL-enabled.
member.returns: DAS connection

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.CreateServerConnection
member.summary: This method creates an Application Server connection, but does not open a socket immediately. The calling code must manually connect to the Application Server.
member.returns: Application Server connection.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.CreateServerConnectionAsync
member.summary: This method creates an Application Server connection as an asynchronous operation, but does not open a socket immediately. The calling code must manually connect to the Application Server.
member.returns: Application Server connection.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.CreateServerConnection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method creates an Application Server connection and opens a socket based on the autoConnect argument. Based on the security settings in the web.config, the client may be SSL-enabled.
member.returns: Application Server connection

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.CreateServerConnectionAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method creates an Application Server connection as an asynchronous operation and opens a socket based on the autoConnect argument. Based on the security settings in the web.config, the client may be SSL-enabled.
member.returns: Application Server connection

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionFactory.CreateDmiTransaction(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a DmiTransaction object with a know transaction type, session security token, and session control ID.
member.returns: Pre-populated DMI transaction object.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool
member.summary: A pool of persistent socket connections to a Colleague environment's application listener.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.SetSizeAsync(Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DmiParameterCustomSection)
member.summary: Sets the maximum pool size using settings from the application's configuration file. The Colleague Server configuration definition.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.SetSizeAsync(System.String,System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the maximum pool size of the named pool with the specified size.
member.param: The name of the connection pool.
The size of the connection pool.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.ShrinkPoolAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all idle connections from the named pool, disconnecting each of them. This allows the pool to shrink without impacting active connections.
member.param: The name of the connection pool to shrink.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.CloseAllConnectionsAsync
member.summary: Closes all open DMI server connections.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.CreatePoolCollectionsAsync(slf4net.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Creates the concurrent collection objects for the named connection pool.
member.param: The name of the new connection pool to create.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.ConnectionPoolName(Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DmiParameterCustomSection)
member.summary: Returns a string identifier consisting of the unique components of a DMI connection that can be used to identify the connection pool for a distinct DMI listener.
member.returns: The name of the connection pool.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.ConnectionPoolName(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a string identifier consisting of the unique components of a DMI connection that can be used to identify the connection pool for a distinct DMI listener.
member.param: Boolean indicating the use of a secure connection.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.CreateConnectionAsync(slf4net.ILogger,Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DmiParameterCustomSection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a DMI server connection object to the DMI listener as an asynchronous operation using settings from the configuration file.
member.param: Indicates whether the connection is part of the connection pool and auto connects it.
member.returns: Returns a connection object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.GetAsync(slf4net.ILogger,Ellucian.WebServices.Core.Config.DmiParameterCustomSection)
member.summary: Waits for an available slot in the active connection pool and when the active connections are below the pool size, it will then try to get a connection from the idle connection pool. If there are no available idle connections, this will return a null which indicates that a new server connection may be created.
member.returns: A connection object.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.ReturnConnectionToPoolAsync(slf4net.ILogger,Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient,System.String)
member.summary: Moves a pooled connection object to an idle connection pool.
member.param: The name of the connection pool to move this connection to.
member.returns: Returns a boolean indicating whether the connection was added to an idle connection pool.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.PutAsync(slf4net.ILogger,Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a connection object to an idle connection pool.
member.param: The name of the connection pool to add the connection to
member.returns: Returns a boolean indicating whether the connection was added to an idle connection pool

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.DmiConnectionPool.ReleaseConnectionPoolLock(slf4net.ILogger,System.String)
member.summary: Release one thread from the pool lock.
member.param: The name of the connection pool to release the thread from

member.summary: Disconnects from the DMI Listener and cleans up all appropriate objects as an asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Disconnects from the DMI Listener and cleans up all appropriate objects.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.DisposeAsync
member.summary: Disconnects from the DMI Listener and cleans up all appropriate objects as an asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.SendBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends a DMI request and receives the DMI response, storing the response in memory which can be retrieved by the ReceiveResponse method. This method also performs some connection integrity tests/validation to ensure that the socket connection is still fully open.
member.param: Request to send in the format of a Byte array

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.SendBytesAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends a DMI request and receives the DMI response as asynchronous transactions. The response is stored in memory which can be retrieved by the ReceiveResponseAsync method. This method also performs some connection integrity tests/validation to ensure that the socket connection is still fully open.
member.param: Request to send in the format of a Byte array

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.DoSendBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Send bytes over the DMI socket connection
member.exception: IOException writing to failover DmiClient in SendBytes or IOException writing to DmiClient in SendBytes

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.DoSendBytesAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Wrap request with DMI header and footer, then send it over the DMI socket connection as an asynchronous transaction
member.exception: IOException writing to failover DmiClient in SendBytesAsync or IOException writing to DmiClient in SendBytesAsync

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.DoSendRawBytesAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Send the byte array over the DMI socket connection as an asynchronous transaction

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.WriteStringToStreamAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Send a string to the connection stream.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.ReadStringFromStreamAsync(System.Int64)
member.summary: Read a string from the connection stream

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.DoReceiveRawBytesAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Read bytes from the client stream, up to the size of the provided buffer
member.param: Byte array with the size of buffer to be filled.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.ProcessNetworkStreamResponse
member.summary: Processes the response to the request from the network stream.
member.exception: IOException reading from Stream in ProcessNetworkStreamResponse or Improperly formatted incoming DMI Transaction - Doesn't begin #nnn# or Improperly formatted incoming DMI Transaction - Bytes Received doesn't equal Bytes expected

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.ProcessNetworkStreamResponseAsync
member.summary: Processes the response to the request from the network stream as an asynchronous transaction
member.exception: IOException reading from Stream in ProcessNetworkStreamResponseAsync or Improperly formatted incoming DMI Transaction - Doesn't begin #nnn# or Improperly formatted incoming DMI Transaction - Bytes Received doesn't equal Bytes expected

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.TestIdleConnection
member.summary: Tests the idle socket connection to ensure it's still valid.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.TestIdleConnectionAsync
member.summary: Tests the idle socket connection as an asynchronous operation to ensure it's still valid.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.TestConnectionAsync
member.summary: Tests the socket connection as an asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.ResetConnection
member.summary: Resets the current DMI client connection. If the client is pooled, it will remain in the pool.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.ResetConnectionAsync
member.summary: Resets the current DMI client connection as an asynchronous operation. If the client is pooled, it will remain in the pool.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.SendRequest(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Sends a DMI request.

member.summary: Receives the DMI response as a string.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.ReceiveStringResponseAsync
member.summary: Receives the DMI response as a string as an asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.ReceiveResponse
member.summary: Returns the response (previously retrieved from the network stream) as a stream object
member.returns: Response in the format of a Byte array converted into a stream.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.ReceiveResponseAsync
member.summary: Returns the response (previously retrieved from the network stream) as a stream object
member.returns: Response in the format of a Byte array converted into a stream.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Dmi.Client.LegacyDmiClient.AddCountWrapper(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Adds wrapper to the DMI request. This adds a #num# to the front of the request with the length of the request and appends #END# to the end.
